DataElement.preferredName: Cancer Therapy Evaluation Program Identifier Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the alphanumeric unique identifier used to identify the Cancer Therapy Evaluation Program, Division of Cancer Treatment and Diagnosis (DCTD) of the NCI which plans, assesses, and coordinates all aspects of clinical trials.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the unique identifier associated with the Cancer Therapy Evaluation Program, Division of Cancer Treatment and Diagnosis (DCTD) of the NCI which plans, assesses, and coordinates all aspects of clinical trials.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The Cancer Therapy Evaluation Program (CTEP) is the program within the Division of Cancer Treatment and Diagnosis (DCTD) of the NCI which plans, assesses, and coordinates all aspects of clinical trials including extramural clinical research programs, internal resources, treatment methods and effectiveness, and compilation and exchange of data as it pertains to the development and evaluation of anticancer agents.

Concepts.definition: The program within the Division of Cancer Treatment and Diagnosis (DCTD) of the NCI which plans, assesses, and coordinates all aspects of clinical trials including extramural clinical research programs, internal resources, treatment methods and effectiveness, and compilation and exchange of data as it pertains to the development and evaluation of anticancer agents.

Property.preferredDefinition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: CTEP Id of the enrolling site

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the alphanumeric unique identifier used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
